p: To verify if the prolonged stability shown by the pristine perovskite containing Zn(II) is also maintained in the presence of 3-CPACl, UV–vis absorption spectra ( Figure S6) and XRD ( Figure 4 a) patterns of freshly made and aged films are collected. The aged samples were measured after 60 days of storage in a Petri dish under ambient conditions of our chemical laboratory where the ambient temperature is (21.0 ± 2) °C and the relative humidity (% RH) is 40 ± 4.
